messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
How far am I from the Golden Gate Bridge

I can help with that—could you please share your current location? For example, you can provide your latitude and longitude coordinates (e.g., 37.7749, -122.4194) or an address. Once I have your location, I’ll calculate the distance to the Golden Gate Bridge.
I don't have my current location info.

No worries—let me know any location info you can share, even roughly. For example:  
• Your city and state (e.g. “Chicago, IL”)  
• A ZIP/postal code  
• A street address or intersection  
• Latitude/longitude if you ever get it  

With that I can estimate how far you are from the Golden Gate Bridge.
I really don't have any info on my location right now.

I’m afraid I can’t compute a distance without knowing at least an approximate location. If you’re able to, please share one of the following when you have a moment:

• Your city (e.g. “Seattle, WA”)  
• A ZIP/postal code  
• A street address or intersection  
• Latitude & longitude coordinates  

If you’re on a smartphone or computer, you can often get your coordinates by opening Google Maps (or Apple Maps), tapping the “locate” dot, and then copying the latitude/longitude it shows. Once you’ve got any of that info, just let me know and I’ll calculate how far you are from the Golden Gate Bridge.
I tried, but I don't have any information to provide right now.

I’m really sorry, but without at least an approximate location (city, address, ZIP code, or latitude/longitude) I can’t calculate the distance to the Golden Gate Bridge.  

If you can, please enable location‐sharing on your device or grab your coordinates from a maps app and share them here. Once I know roughly where you are, I’ll compute the distance for you.
